info.title: Luar Sekolah LMS API
info.description: Learning Management System API for course management and enrollment

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of todos with optional filtering by completion status

schema.description: Whether the todo item is completed or not

text.description: Text content of the todo item

completed.description: Whether the todo item is completed or not

post.description: Create a new todo item with specified text and optional completion status

text.description: Text content of the todo item

completed.description: Whether the todo item is completed or not

schema.title: Create Todo Request
schema.description: Input data for creating a new todo

text.description: Text content of the todo item

completed.description: Whether the todo item is completed or not

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific todo using its unique identifier

text.description: Text content of the todo item

completed.description: Whether the todo item is completed or not

put.description: Update specific fields of an existing todo. Only provided fields will be updated

text.description: Text content of the todo item

completed.description: Whether the todo item is completed or not

schema.title: Update Todo Request
schema.description: Input data for updating an existing todo

text.description: Text content of the todo item

completed.description: Whether the todo item is completed or not

delete.description: Delete a todo permanently. Cannot be undone

schema.title: Delete Todo Request
schema.description: Input data for deleting a todo

patch.description: Toggle the completion status of a todo item (completed ↔ not completed)

schema.title: Toggle Todo Request
schema.description: Input data for toggling todo completion status

text.description: Text content of the todo item

completed.description: Whether the todo item is completed or not

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of courses with optional filtering by category tags

schema.description: Array of category tags as strings (from schema)

price.description: Price of the course as decimal string (from schema)

categoryTag.description: Array of category tags as strings (from schema)

thumbnail.description: URL of the course thumbnail image (nullable in schema)

rating.description: Course rating as decimal string (from schema)

message.default: Free courses cannot have ratings above 3.0
Prakerja courses should not exceed Rp 1,000,000

post.description: Create a new course with specified details. Creator attribution is automatically added for authenticated users

price.description: Price of the course as decimal string (from schema)

categoryTag.description: Array of category tags as strings (from schema)

thumbnail.description: URL of the course thumbnail image (nullable in schema)

rating.description: Course rating as decimal string (from schema)

schema.title: Create Course Request
schema.description: Input data for creating a new course

price.description: Price of the course as decimal string (from schema)

categoryTag.description: Array of category tags as strings (from schema)

thumbnail.description: URL of the course thumbnail image (nullable in schema)

rating.description: Course rating as decimal string (from schema)

message.default: Free courses cannot have ratings above 3.0
Prakerja courses should not exceed Rp 1,000,000

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific course using its unique identifier

price.description: Price of the course as decimal string (from schema)

categoryTag.description: Array of category tags as strings (from schema)

thumbnail.description: URL of the course thumbnail image (nullable in schema)

rating.description: Course rating as decimal string (from schema)

message.default: Free courses cannot have ratings above 3.0
Prakerja courses should not exceed Rp 1,000,000

put.description: Update specific fields of an existing course. Only provided fields will be updated

price.description: Price of the course as decimal string (from schema)

categoryTag.description: Array of category tags as strings (from schema)

thumbnail.description: URL of the course thumbnail image (nullable in schema)

rating.description: Course rating as decimal string (from schema)

data.title: Update Course Request
data.description: Input data for updating an existing course

price.description: Price of the course as decimal string (from schema)

categoryTag.description: Array of category tags as strings (from schema)

thumbnail.description: URL of the course thumbnail image (nullable in schema)

rating.description: Course rating as decimal string (from schema)

message.default: Free courses cannot have ratings above 3.0
Prakerja courses should not exceed Rp 1,000,000

delete.description: Delete a course permanently. Cannot be undone and only allowed if no active enrollments exist

schema.title: Delete Course Request
schema.description: Input data for deleting a course

message.default: Free courses cannot have ratings above 3.0
Prakerja courses should not exceed Rp 1,000,000

post.description: Enroll the authenticated user in a specific course. Prevents duplicate enrollments

schema.title: Enroll Course Request
schema.description: Input data for enrolling in a course

price.description: Price of the course as decimal string (from schema)

categoryTag.description: Array of category tags as strings (from schema)

thumbnail.description: URL of the course thumbnail image (nullable in schema)

rating.description: Course rating as decimal string (from schema)

schema.title: Enrollment with Course Response
schema.description: Enrollment with course details response object

message.default: User is already enrolled in this course

get.description: Retrieve a list of courses the authenticated user is enrolled in, with enrollment details

price.description: Price of the course as decimal string (from schema)

categoryTag.description: Array of category tags as strings (from schema)

thumbnail.description: URL of the course thumbnail image (nullable in schema)

rating.description: Course rating as decimal string (from schema)

items.title: Enrollment with Course Response
items.description: Enrollment with course details response object

message.default: User is already enrolled in this course
